docs.snippet: SANTIAGO, Chile, March 19-- Argentine customs authorities last night clamped a ban on the entry in Buenos Aires of all foreign newspapers and magazines, according to airline attendants at the Platarini airport at Ezeiza.
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTIAGO, Chile, March 19-- Argentine customs authorities last night clamped a ban on the entry in Buenos Aires of all foreign newspapers and magazines, according to airline attendants at the Platarini airport at Ezeiza.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, March 21--An order for the arrest of the publisher of La Prensa, Dr. Alberto Gainza Paz, was issued tonight by the joint Congressional committee that yesterday took over the independent newspaper's main building. Dr. Gainza Paz was...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, March 21--An order for the arrest of the publisher of La Prensa, Dr. Alberto Gainza Paz, was issued tonight by the joint Congressional committee that yesterday took over the independent newspaper's main building. Dr. Gainza Paz was charged with contempt of Congress and received a fifteen-day jail sentence.

docs.snippet: SANTIAGO, Chile, March 21-- The four-and-a-half-week session of the United Nations Economic and Social Council came to a close this afternoon with a final attack on the United States by the Soviet bloc regarding United States policy toward Spain.
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTIAGO, Chile, March 21-- The four-and-a-half-week session of the United Nations Economic and Social Council came to a close this afternoon with a final attack on the United States by the Soviet bloc regarding United States policy toward Spain.

docs.snippet: A single, independent agency for control of export trade will be set up in Washington if the recommendations of the International Development Advisory Board are carried out, according to August Maffry, vice president of the Irving Trust Company.
docs.lead_paragraph: A single, independent agency for control of export trade will be set up in Washington if the recommendations of the International Development Advisory Board are carried out, according to August Maffry, vice president of the Irving Trust Company.
docs.abstract: A Maffry sees single, ind export control agency if Internatl Development Advisory Bd plan materializes
